title: Love Endures All Things
description: The whole world turned upside down when the United States went to war in 1941. Chancy Thompson worries about family and friends who are either serving in the military or doing some other war-related jobs that take them away from home. She also has trouble making ends meet with the rationing of food and other things. The times are hard. In spite of her dislike of gardening, Chancy has a victory garden so that the family will have enough food to eat all year. She loves the canning and preserving part even if she doesn't enjoy the outside work. However, God takes care of everyone.This Christian romance will warm your heart as you learn about the hard times during WW2. The facts were researched to make it a correct historical romance set in Texas. This book is the third in the Chance on Love series. COMING LOVE NEVER FAILS.
author: Jackie Ricks
